Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class IteratedPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Phase
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.IteratedPhase
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionPhase, PlanningPhase, PreparePhase
abstract class IteratedPhase extends Phase
The IteratedPhase class represents a Phase that has a current player that is authorized to modify the state of the game.

    • IteratedPhase

      IteratedPhase(Phase previous, Player current)
      Creates a new IteratedPhase with the given Player as its current.

      previous - the previous Phase that led to the creation of this one
      current - the current Player
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • authorizePlayer

      public Player authorizePlayer(String username) throws InvalidPlayerException
      Checks if the player with the given username exists and has permission to modify the game state.
      Overrides:
      authorizePlayer in class Phase
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to authorize
      Returns:
      a Player object
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - either if the specified player username is invalid or it is not the specified player's turn

    • dump

      PhaseDiff dump()
      Dumps all this Phase's information into a PhaseDiff. It is conceptually equivalent to diffing with an empty Phase.
